scripts.release-mac: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/* && electron-packager ../loop-drop-app "Loop Drop" --prune --platform=darwin --version=0.28.1 --arch=x64 --ignore="(build|releases|test|sounds|doc|tests|mocha|node_modules/midi)/" --out="build" --app-version=`cd ../loop-drop-app && npv` --icon=icon.icns && sh codesign.sh && appdmg appdmg.json "releases/Loop Drop v`cd ../loop-drop-app && npv`.dmg"
